info.title: Vidgo API - Extend Music API
info.description: Extend or modify existing music by creating a continuation based on a source audio track

post.description: Extend or modify existing music by creating a continuation based on a source audio track

input.prompt: Continue with an energetic chorus section
input.title: Summer Vibes Extended

BearerAuth.description:
All API endpoints require Bearer Token authentication

Get your API Key:

Visit the [API Key Management Page](https://vidgo.ai/apis/dashboard/api-key) to get your API Key

Add it to the request header:

```
Authorization: Bearer VIDGO_API_KEY
```

model.description:
API model identifier.

Must be `extend-music` for this endpoint.

callback_url.description:
Webhook callback URL for result notifications.

Endpoint that receives task completion updates.

default_param_flag.description:
Controls whether to use custom parameters or inherit from the source audio.

- When `true`: Enables custom parameter mode. `prompt`, `style`, `title`, and `continue_at` become required.

- When `false`: Only `audio_id` and `mv` are required.

audio_id.description:
Identifier of the source audio track to extend.

This is the unique ID of an existing track that you want to continue or modify.

prompt.description:
Description of how you want to extend the music.

Required when `default_param_flag` is `true`.

Character limits by model:
- **V4**: Maximum 3000 characters
- **V4_5 & V4_5PLUS**: Maximum 5000 characters
- **V4_5ALL**: Maximum 5000 characters
- **V5**: Maximum 5000 characters
prompt.example: Continue with an energetic chorus section

style.description:
Music style specification for the extended section.

Required when `default_param_flag` is `true`.

Character limits by model:
- **V4**: Maximum 200 characters
- **V4_5 & V4_5PLUS**: Maximum 1000 characters
- **V4_5ALL**: Maximum 1000 characters
- **V5**: Maximum 1000 characters

title.description:
Title for the extended track.

Required when `default_param_flag` is `true`.

Character limits by model:
- **V4**: Maximum 80 characters
- **V4_5 & V4_5PLUS**: Maximum 100 characters
- **V4_5ALL**: Maximum 80 characters
- **V5**: Maximum 100 characters

continue_at.description:
The timestamp (in seconds) from which to start the extension.

Specifies the point in the original track where the extension should begin.

Required when `default_param_flag` is `true`.

mv.description:
AI model version for music extension.

- **V5**: Superior musical expressiveness with faster generation
- **V4_5PLUS**: Enhanced tonal richness with new creative approaches, max 8 min duration
- **V4_5**: Improved prompt intelligence and faster generation, max 8 min duration
- **V4_5ALL**: V4_5ALL enables smarter prompts, faster generations, max 8 min duration
- **V4**: Improved vocal quality, max 4 min duration

negative_tags.description:
Music styles or characteristics to exclude from the extension.

Specify unwanted genres, moods, or instruments to avoid in the output.

vocal_gender.description:
Preferred vocal gender for the extended section.

- `m`: Male vocals
- `f`: Female vocals

**Note**: This parameter increases the probability but cannot guarantee the specified gender.

style_weight.description:
Controls how strongly the specified style influences the extension.

Range: 0-1, up to 2 decimals.

Higher values result in stronger adherence to the specified style.

weirdness_constraint.description:
Controls the level of experimental creativity and unconventional elements.

Range: 0-1, up to 2 decimals.

- Lower values: More conventional music
- Higher values: More experimental and unique outputs

audio_weight.description:
Balances audio characteristics against other generation factors.

Range: 0-1, up to 2 decimals.

Adjusts the emphasis on audio quality and sonic features in the final output.

persona_id.description:
Persona ID to apply to the extended music.

Only available when Custom Mode ( `default_param_flag: true` ) is enabled.

Use this to apply a specific persona style to your music extension.

How to generate persona_id, visit [generate-persona](/api-manual/music-series/generate-persona).

task_id.description: Unique task identifier for status tracking

created_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the task was created

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong
